Stepaction.text1:
Great! To work on this action, go to My Actions in the Dashboard.

The Diabetes Health Coach digital program recommends setting a reminder to do this action. Do you want to set a reminder?

Steptracker.text1:
Great! To work on this tracker, go to My Trackers in the Dashboard.

The Diabetes Health Coach digital program recommends setting a reminder to do this tracker. Do you want to set a reminder?

Step1.text1: The Diabetes Health Coach digital program recommends setting up a reminder to track your progress. Check the boxes to set up reminders by text message and/or e-mail.
Step1.title: Add Reminder

options.text: On the First of Each Month

Step1.errorMessage: Please select how often you take it

items2.label: By checking this box, I AGREE to receive automatically sent text message reminders from Novo Nordisk Inc. as part of its Diabetes Health Coach program at the mobile number below.

I understand that I am not required to provide my consent as a condition of participation in the Diabetes Health Coach program.


You will receive text messages as frequently as you choose.

Message and data rates may apply.

For more information about our Terms of Use go to Terms of Use.

To view Novo Nordisk's Privacy Policy go to Privacy Policy.


To unsubscribe, go to My Preferences to manage your reminders.

For help, visit Contact Us



Please print for your records.

Step3.text11: Your Reminder text will be sent to
Step3.title: Add reminder
Step3.text12: . To change your mobile phone number for text messages or reminders, please go to My Preferences.

Step4.text1: Your Reminder e-mail will be sent to: [email@email.com]. Remember to add customercarecenter@cornerstones4care.com to your contacts list so your reminders do not end up in your spam folder. To change your reminders, go to My Preferences.
Step4.title: Add Reminder
